full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
EC015-241575 - RFP for Edmundston Fit-Up Design

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design services required to renovate the first and second floors of the Edmundston Service Canada Centre located at 2 Emmerson Street, Edmundston, New Brunswick. The scope of work includes renovating existing spaces for 32 full-time employees, upgrading the existing LAN Room, and ensuring the ESDC office space is accessible to all employees and the public. The project requires compliance with the B651HB-23 accessibility standard.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Supply Arrangement**: E0225-152290 Architecture and Interior Design SA list for New Brunswick
* **Invited Firms**: Groupe Leclerc Architecture & Design, SableARC Studios Inc., Fowler Bauld & Mitchell Ltd., and Trilogy Interior Design Inc.
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-11 (subject to change)

## Services Required
The successful tenderer will be responsible for providing architectural and interior design services for the renovation of the first and second floors of the Service Canada Centre. The work will involve phased construction, including temporary swing space arrangements. The contractor must be able to provide construction documents in both French and English and obtain necessary permits and approvals.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Carlos Castillo Nieto (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not provided

## Languages

* **Official Language**: Both English and French are official languages. Services and documents must be provided in both languages.

## Regions
The project is located in the province of New Brunswick, Canada. The contract will be administered by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Gatineau, Quebec.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA
